name: discord-birthday-bot
description: A Discord bot that tracks and announces birthdays

scripts.docker:run: echo 'Usage: docker run -d --name birthday_bot --restart unless-stopped -e TZ=America/New_York -e NODE_ENV=production -e DISCORD_TOKEN=your_token -e DISCORD_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id -e BIRTHDAY_CHANNEL_ID=your_channel_id -v ./data:/app/data birthday-bot'
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop birthday_bot && docker rm birthday_bot
scripts.docker:deploy: chmod +x scripts/docker-run.sh && echo 'Usage: ./scripts/docker-run.sh TOKEN CLIENT_ID CHANNEL_ID'
